headline: Cencora Appoints Mark Durcan as Chairman of Its Board of Directors
summary: CONSHOHOCKEN, Pa., August 27, 2025--Cencora, Inc. (NYSE: COR) today announced that its Board of Directors has appointed Lead Independent Director D. Mark Durcan as Chairman of the Board of Directors, effective October 1, 2025. Mr. Durcan will succeed Steven H. Collis, who has served as Cencora’s Chairman since 2016 and previously served as Cencora’s Chief Executive Officer from 2011 until 2024. As previously disclosed, Mr. Collis was elected to serve as Executive Chairman of the Board effective
